channel.title: Exodus-pk 718|dailyupdates|Eco|VPS|NEED STAFF|new sever|Great Pking|new sever
channel.description:
Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/gzg7s3cl94vt64q/Exodus%20PK%20Client.jar?dl=0 Website : http://exoduspkrsps.enjin.com/home
Hello everyone! Welcome to Exospawn PvP. The last time we advertised back in october we decided to close the sever up but now we just put the sever up again ! we hope you have a great time on this sever . We are taking suggestions about what content you would like to have put in shops , new bosses , new places to explore etc. new name for the sever is coming out soon IT IS NOT A SPAWN thanks for taking time out of your day to read this means alot to us
exodus pk is built on the players thoughts and ideas, we listen to our community feedback and take note on everything said.
small but good community we hope to grow to a large community ( small community bc we started yesterday) good website. Amazing PVM and tons of bosses. Great PKing. No OP weapons. Dungeoneering. Pest Control Barrows (Including Guthans and Dharoks.) Stable ECONOMY Jad All SpellBooks Tok-Har-Kal Fully functional slayer Max cape Unique home BXP weekends GWD Nex Frost dragons Spirit shields Daily Updates Duel arena custom donator zone
we need staff but try to earn staff by working hard and not just begging the owner for it be helpful and active in the community
Over 20+ Pvm teles Including Nomad armadyl Bandos Saradomin Nex Corp KBD Tormented demons Barrows Brimhaven dugeon Dragons Rock crabs Glacors Jadinko lair tzhar volcano polypore dungeon Slayer tower lv 1 lv 2 lv 3 Revenants Bork Mith dragons Wild wyrm +More
Skilling teles Woodcutting Dung Runecrafting Agility Fishing Cooking +More
The server is a 667 with older item graphics added (like the normal dh and normal metal armor such as rune)
There are many features. All sorts of PvM from barrows to jad and even revs, 14 working skills, many types of currency including PkP Tickets and Dungeoneering Coins, and more!
Combat is perfect. PvP and PvM are great because of the awesome combat system.
when 20 players are on at once for the first time(and the owner is on), there will be a drop party with rares and many valuables!
Fully working ags , dbow ,dclaws , all godswords specs!
unique starter kit
Eco based sever now
custom pvm and pkp shops!
This is a rather new server. Please invite any friends and try to get players when you can
